text: does your code look like this when you are calling for the accessToken?

feel free to use my code base as a reference: <https://github.com/danguenet/hs-lookup-properties/blob/main/company-contact-lookup/src/app/app.functions/updateProperty.js>

If you notice I do not put any secrets in the serverless.json file. Instead I use a .env (you can see the example one in the code) for local and process.env should just use the right secret in production if everything else is set up properly. or at least that is my understanding.
